text: Luiz Yoshio Onmura (29 June 1960 – 1 November 2024) was a Brazilian judoka. He represented Brazil at the 1980, 1984 and the 1988 Summer Olympics. Onmura won a bronze medal in the men's lightweight division. He was born in São Paulo, Brazil. Onmura died from squamous-cell cancer in Santos, Brazil on 1 November 2024, at the age of 64. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Deaths from squamous-cell carcinoma Category:Judoka Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Brazil Category:Sportspeople from São Paulo
title: Luiz Onmura
